turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I'm surrounded by idiots.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: You need to get laid!

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: No...  That's the sound of the men working on the chain gang.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Are there any other shuttles?

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Sumbitch won't be giving us anymore trouble.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: You killed him?

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Blew half his skull away, one leg, one arm and left his entrails stretched across the lab. And look at me! I'm covered in his filthy blood!

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: The air's laced with type two ozone, it reads as a solid.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Somebody wanted the place to stay hidden.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: In twenty-eighty-two many of the survivors moved their facilities underground to escape . . .

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: The cryo unit leaked. The computers sealed the room. No airborne viruses no hazardous materials. I've shut down the until. Alright, stand back.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Hold your breath. Initial cryo gasses will render you unconcious.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: I didn't say I was good at it.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Oh shit! There he is!

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: I'll never experience my fantasy of three sex droids, two humans, and a Knofflapod. Damn.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Am I in there?

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Sory...

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: It's just you and me, then.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Come here, might as well fix that arm.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Almost done.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Ow!

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Oh, hush. I disengaged your pain programming.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Sometimes I just wish I had a kitten.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Sorry, sorry.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Who are you apologizing to?

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Good point.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Do I have to?

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Yes, I've reprogrammed you. You are very brave. Bad ass.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Oh, alright.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Kay-Em, you okay?

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Don't worry about me. I live for this shit.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: You did good, Kay-Em. I'm proud of you.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: A real mamma's boy that one. Dissed his mamma and he nearly threw a tantrum. Little good it did him.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Kay-Em we made it!

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: Oh, goody. I'm so pleased. I'd clap if I could.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Kay-em you okay?

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: I am now. I missed you, Thorgan.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: I missed you too.

turns.speaker: KAY-EM 14
turns.text: I love you.

turns.speaker: KICKER
turns.text: Yo, Teach, what the fuck?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: We're missing two of the kids!

turns.speaker: KICKER
turns.text: Get your ass back to the shuttle. I'll check it out.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Fat Lou, bring the ship to the following coordinates. Call Grendel, have them power up the labs, we're bringing in the find of the century!

turns.speaker: KICKER
turns.text: Now wait a minute! I don't think you should open that door.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: This is a science excursion corporal. Just stay out of the way.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Kicker!

turns.speaker: KICKER
turns.text: Defense droids. I'm on it.

turns.speaker: KICKER
turns.text: Leave him behind!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: No! He's coming with us!

turns.speaker: KKINSA
turns.text: I don't understand...what does he want?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: He wants to kill you...and me...and everyone on this ship.

turns.speaker: KKINSA
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Ssh.

turns.speaker: KKINSA
turns.text: How do you know?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I just know.

turns.speaker: KKINSA
turns.text: Something's wrong.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Keep trying!

turns.speaker: KKINSA
turns.text: The power's back up!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Then open the doors!

turns.speaker: KKINSA
turns.text: Thirty seconds.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Damn!  Close the door! I'll be right back.

turns.speaker: KKINSA
turns.text: What?!!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I gotta go back.

turns.speaker: KKINSA
turns.text: But?!!

turns.speaker: PEREZ
turns.text: You son of a bitch, you know what time it is?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: We just left old Earth. You'll never believe what we found.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: I'm sending you the files.

turns.speaker: PEREZ
turns.text: Yeah, yeah if this is another ancient Farrari . . .

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Trust me. I'm bypassing regular channels. See what kind of payday we're looking at.

turns.speaker: PEREZ
turns.text: Alright, I'm . . .  No way . . . is this a joke?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Hypothetically, how much are we talking?

turns.speaker: PEREZ
turns.text: If you're for real, you're looking at a million credits for viewing rights alone. Doesn't include touring and guest lectures. When can you get them here?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: I'll reset our course . . . 3 hours?

turns.speaker: PEREZ
turns.text: See you then . . . doctor.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Where..? Who . . .?  I'm alive. You brought me back.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Obviously so.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: How did I get here, how did you bring me back?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Nanotechnology.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Nano...but nanotechnology is impossible.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: We've had Nano-Tech for the last 30 years.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: 30? How long was I out?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Now lay back we need to do some tests and I have some questions...

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: JASON?! WHERE IS HE?!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: We need to do some tests...I'd like to ask you a few questions.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: But...I...400 years?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: That's right, now if you could...

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Jason? He's on this ship?!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Of course he is. He's the most relevant find in 400 years...except for you, of course. Look if you're worried about PR don't be. You're walking and talking.  He's a stiff. You'll get the publicity.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Are you finished?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Jason! Can't you see? He did this.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Impossible! He was dead before he entered Cryo-statis. There is no possible way he could be alive.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: I didn't say he was alive.

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Azrael can you repeat that?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Get him out of there!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: That's ridiculous. You're overreacting.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Why don't you get it? He's going to kill us all!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: You're not going anywhere.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: You wanna die?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Are we locked down?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: What good will that do?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: They can deal with this sort of thing.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: More soldiers?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: Scientists. Very intellegent men.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: That's great. I bet they'll kick Jason's ass at a spelling bee!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Guys, please come with me!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: 4You're not going anywhere.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: How do you open the damn door?

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: You're crazy!

turns.speaker: YLLO
turns.text: It's okay, he just wanted his machete.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Three...two...one...

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: The hockey player? He a friend of yours?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Hockey player? He's not a ...

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: He's dead! Everyone's dead! Old Earth is dead!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Old Earth?

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: What have you done?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: What have I done?! Idiots.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: So, you're saying thse guys have like, lasers and stuff? They could hack him to pieces?

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Exactly.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Yes!

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Listen up duck fuckers, you can't kill this thing.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Listen to me. Please. Let's get off thsi ship. Come with me.

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Rizzo, a shuttle out in the middle of space? We'll die oout there.

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Can we get through these?

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: Sure but what good will that do?

turns.speaker: RIZZO
turns.text: Guys, he's right behind us!

turns.speaker: THORGAN
turns.text: It's okay.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Cut my hand. Hit by a vampire.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: On the swing? I told you not to play near there until I sanded it down.  See what your son did?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Son! -- Out of the water now!

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: My boat's neat, dad!

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: I want him out of the ocean.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: You're not going to the ocean with that, are you son?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'm all checked out for light surf and look at it.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Do me this favor just once. Use the ponds.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Dad, the ponds are for old ladies.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Just a favor for your old man.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Sure, Dad.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: My cars. And a comic book.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Here --  Take him home.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Did you bring a check?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Cash? Or do we do this on a handshake and a promise?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: I'm authorized by the township of Amity to hire you as an independent contractor. We'll meet your price. $10,000.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: And my regular daily rate -- $200, whether we catch him or not.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: You got it.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: And incidental damages, if any...

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: You got it.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: And you get the Mayor off my back with this zoning crap. Nobody tells me how to run my property.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: You got it.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: And, uh, a case of apricot brandy and you buy the lunch.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Two cases. And dinner when you land.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Try some of this. I made it myself.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: This is Matt Hooper...

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: I know who he is...

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: He's from the Oceanographic Institute.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Hey. Knock it off. I don't want to have to listen to this while we're out there...

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: What do you mean 'We...?'

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: It's my charter. My party.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: All right, Commissioner. But when we're on my ship, I am Master, Mate and Pilot. And I want him...  ...along for ballast.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: You got it.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Keep that chum line going -- we've got five good miles. Don't break it.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Who's driving the boat?

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Nobody. We're drifting with the current.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Why are we way out here, when the shark's back there?

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: ...'cause this is where he lives. You gotta think like they do.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: You got it?

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Get behind me, dummy!  Reverse her and turn -- he's taking too much line!  Wet my reel, quick!

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: The wire's showing!

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Unbuckle me -- fast!  Grab the leader. He ain't normal, this one... they never --

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: What's the point with hooks and Lines? --

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Don't tell me my business!  Quarter-mile, that way. Full throttle.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: How -- if they're gonna keep on breaking?

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: What I do is trick him to the surface, got that? Then I can jab him, understand?  Think I'm gonna haul it in as if he's a catfish, like everyone else does?

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: I never saw one that big.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: What do we do? Get some help? Radio in?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Why don't we go in? Get another crack at him tomorrow.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: We got a barrel on him. We can't lose him. We stay out here until we find him.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Let's call in -- we can radio and have a big boat here in an hour...

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: You hired me, remember? It's my $10,000. It's my shark...

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Look a' that -- Bayonet Iwo Jima.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: C'mon. Middle appendix --

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: I almost had 'im.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: What's that one, there?

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Tattoo. Had it taken off.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: He's busting the shaft! Start the pump!

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Where...?

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: The bilge pumps. There --

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: That's it! Radio in for help!

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Shut up! Just pump her out!

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Yeah, Captain, as soon as I make a call.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Did you get him in the head?

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: No! No! No!  Swing around! After him!

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: What about us?

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Have to pump her steady, s'all.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: He can't stay down with three barrels on him! Where is he?!

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Have you ever had one do this?

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: No!

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: He's trying to sink us!

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Dead astern! Zig-zag!

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: He's chasing us! I don't believe it.

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: Full throttle! To port!

turns.speaker: QUINT
turns.text: He's comin' up -- !

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: He's taken him!

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: How come the sun didn't used to shine in here?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: 'cause when we bought the house it was Autumn. This is summer. Feed the dogs.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Do you see the kids?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Probably out in the back yard.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: In Amity, you say 'Yahd.'

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: The kids are in the yahd, playing near the cah. How's that sound?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Like you're from N'Yawk.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Give me 30 years, I'll get it.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Did you burn another kettle? Y'know you're a fire hazard? This is the third one!

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I never hear the whistle.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Feed the dogs.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You want to go through those?  I'm taking them to the Thrift Shop. It's Marcia Vaughn's pet charity. Pick out what you want to keep -- it's mostly your city clothes.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: I used to wear this to the Garden. Garbage strikes. Dog shit. Muggers.  Ship it.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Don't be silly - You're going to make summer better for them...

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Don't forget these.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Oh, yeah.  How do I look? Older, huh?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I think they make you look sexy.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Sexy, hm? What was I before?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Older, sillier.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: I don't want to depend on these things, y'know - sometimes you can weaken your eyes.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Be careful.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Here? You gotta be kiddin'.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Love ya.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Hey Chief. Bring my cup back.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You're very tight, y'know?  Right there.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Ow.  He's gotta be more careful in the water...

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Can you stand something to eat?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Love a cup of tea. With lemon.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Mikey loves his birthday present.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Where is he?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: He's sitting in it.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: It's three feet deep, Martin

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Michael! Come inside!

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: It's his birthday present, and you closed the beach, Honey. I told him not to go in the water after what happened yesterday. I don't believe he'll ever do it again.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: I told him not to go out until he memorized the handbook and the safety safety regulations, until he was sure of himself...

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: How come you have to tell them that?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Excuse me, but what are you talking about? Didn't they catch the shark this afternoon? It was on the Cape station news.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: You too, sweetheart...

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Why don't we have one more drink, you and I, and then we go down and cut open that old shark and see for sure what's inside him, or not.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Can you do that?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: I am Chief of Police. I can do anything I want.  You want to come?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Home... New York?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: No. Home here.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Colorful, isn't he?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You going to be all right?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Nothing to worry about -- I'll survive this.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'll see you back soon. There's an extra pair of glasses in your black socks, and there's some suntan lotion and blistex in your kit.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Yo-ho-ho and a bottle of rum.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: What'll I tell the kids?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Tell 'em I went fishin'!

turns.speaker: VAUGHN
turns.text: Martin!  Are you going to shut down the beach on your own authority?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Do I need any more authority?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Now tell me something I don't know.

turns.speaker: VAUGHN
turns.text: All I'm saying is that Amity is a summer town -- we need summer dollars, and if they can't swim here, they'll use the beaches at Cape Cod, or Long Island.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: So we should set out a smorgasbord?

turns.speaker: VAUGHN
turns.text: I don't think you can appreciate the gut reaction people have to these things.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: I was only reacting to what I was told.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: I can't work in a vacuum. Why don't you make Hendricks Chief? His family's been here since the Puritans -- half this island are his cousins.

turns.speaker: VAUGHN
turns.text: Martin, we hired the best man we could find.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: I'll get to that in a minute. First, I plan to start our seasonal summer help early, and to use shark spotters on beaches open to the sea. I'd like cooperation from local fishermen, and I've also contacted the Oceanographic Institute over on the mainland.

turns.speaker: VAUGHN
turns.text: No need to involve outsiders in our business, Martin.

turns.speaker: VAUGHN
turns.text: Only 24 hours!

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: I didn't agree to that!

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Larry, if you'd see these clowns leave, you'd never believe they'd come back with anything. But they got him!

turns.speaker: VAUGHN
turns.text: That's good. That's real good. Ben Meadows getting pictures for the paper.

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Sure he is.

turns.speaker: VAUGHN
turns.text: Who's that young man?

turns.speaker: BRODY
turns.text: Matt Hooper, the specialist they send down from the Oceanographic Institute.

turns.speaker: VAUGHN
turns.text: I think we all owe a debt of gratitude to these men for catching this monster.
